body:
Hi Randolph,

I ran your OBJ snippet through the HEAD version of obj2rad, and it didn't complain.  I made some recent changes at the request of Jack de Valpine.

Best,
-Greg
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] Re: obj2rad: "bad face" and "bad triangle"
subject: [Radiance-general] Re: obj2rad: "bad face" and "bad triangle"
